text: The Wedding Singer is a 1998 American romantic comedy movie starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore. It follows a wedding singer falling in love with a waitress in 1984. ==References== * Category:1998 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies about singers Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:New Line Cinema movies
title: The Wedding Singer
